errors.error_description: The installation command is missing the `-c conda-forge` channel argument, which is necessary to locate the `calliope` package.
correction_candidates: Add `-c conda-forge` to the `mamba create` command.
Add a separate command `conda config --add channels conda-forge` before the installation command.
Change the command to `mamba create -n calliope -c conda-forge python && conda activate calliope && mamba install calliope`.
errors.golden_answer: Add `-c conda-forge` to the `mamba create` command.
